title: Laughing Fish's 40k lifetime upvote spectacular! (Come and get your free skins!)
body:
Greetings loved ones and fellow summoners! It is I, The Laughing Fish, here with a message: I have just hit 40,000 lifetime upvotes! To celebrate this momentous occasion, I have decided to give out some free skins.
http://www.viralkivi.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/08/Spread_love1.gif
How does one get a free skin you might ask?
http://www.hercareer.pk/herway/wp-content/uploads/2014/07/Dont-interrupt.gif
I was about to tell you before you so rudely interrupted. Anyway, getting a free skin is easy: Simply post an upvote gif below! Oh, and **say my name**. I am not joking, if you do not say my name you cannot win.
https://38.media.tumblr.com/824637154a6cb88c100bf37c6caa086d/tumblr_no1fm1DSou1qjnl39o1_500.gif

Prizes One: A mystery skin given to a random commenter
Prize Two: A mystery champion given to the commenter with the most upvotes on this tread
Prize Thee: If this thread reaches 100 upvotes, another mystery skin will be given to a random commenter
Prize Four: If this thread reaches 200 upvotes, a final mystery skin will go to a random commenter

Winners will be announced Wednesday, and the prizes will be sent out on Thursday!

https://media.giphy.com/media/YPIrsRqqO7oB2/giphy.gif

**The contest is now closed! Winners will be chosen shortly (there is a lot of comments to sort through). Thank you all for the support :D**


#Winners have been chosen! Go to http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/memes/pLLetFgO-and-the-winners-of-laughing-fishs-40k-lifetime-upvote-spectacular-are for more information.

replies.body: Fuck the rules
http://media.giphy.com/media/VJys6sgIRtcNa/giphy.gif

Laughing Fish, have an upvote, a gif, and an upvote gif.
http://img.pandawhale.com/87520-Jewel-Staite-upvote-gif-Kaylee-6brk.gif
http://www.sobusygirls.fr/uploads/2015/09/feed-me-more.gif

**This is Laughing Fish right now.**

http://i2.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/newsfeed/000/678/588/821.gif
http://33.media.tumblr.com/3b111894fa0743634e4334859bc80cd1/tumblr_n688neF06q1rqysdno1_250.gif

Take this, Laughing Fish. Not because I want a skin, but because through all of the nerf threads and complaints, you still focus on entertainment.

https://33.media.tumblr.com/ed0e2f45529b58f593dad3e914fac4e2/tumblr_mlaxtrDxW91s9d395o1_500.gif
http://www.chasingmyextraordinary.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/Happy-Gif.gif
Laughing Fish, you're amazing! [(http://i.imgur.com/zyqHDuA.gif)]
http://i.imgur.com/RjhgRow.gif?noredirect

Still *fishing* for more upvotes I see, Mr. Laughing Fish.

http://i.imgur.com/5hQ5Vou.gif
https://media.giphy.com/media/ToMjGpuDlPJP9k5NHdC/giphy.gif

I will crawl out of my hole... just for you Laughing Fish :)
https://i.imgur.com/ll6pPxK.jpg
http://e.lvme.me/ug7vmox.jpg

Even if there *was* a potential free skin, Deviating now would just hurt the resistance.
So here's my usual down-vote.

https://33.media.tumblr.com/e3705e9825ca836ab4d89ebbd67e3053/tumblr_n588qhtNYn1qmkyvso1_500.gif
https://mbathenonprofitway.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/who-are-you-again.gif

(http://99gifs.com/-img/51403a53afa96f099400d404.gif?w=612&h=347)

Laughing Fish, ya pleb m8.

http://img.pandawhale.com/50289-Game-of-Thrones-Imgur-upvote-g-tHAn.gif

Laughing Fish, I look forward to the inevitable WMU you are creating...

You will not gift in EUW, but i gift you a gif.

^Laughing Fish all day, everyday.

http://i.imgur.com/vh9ANah.gif

http://i1378.photobucket.com/albums/ah116/Daniel_Fritsch/Lorana_zps6bvfd4yb.png Someone downvoted him!? >:(
Bring in more upvotes to counteract this hater!

https://media.giphy.com/media/fkQSlv3IMhVVm/giphy.gif

http://i1378.photobucket.com/albums/ah116/Daniel_Fritsch/Lorana_zps6bvfd4yb.png But in all seriousness Laughing Fish Congratulations! I think to commemorate this event I'm going to use the very first Gif I ever saw you post. It made me laugh so much and brightened my day! Again congratulations Laughing Fish!

http://img.pandawhale.com/post-57879-sorry-thats-not-my-upvote-gif-lxMm.gif

That is the perfect upvote gif!
http://www.reactiongifs.com/r/yb.gif

Laughing Fish, the hero these boards deserve.  Thanks for all the laughs man!

I am just going to give myself a lot of gifts.

I love you.

Sincerely
Stiv

(Also, are we allowed multiple entries cause I found some other good upvote gifs)

http://gifrific.com/wp-content/uploads/2012/04/nobody-crosses-chucknorris.gif
Sorry, one entry per person. But feel free to post more praises to me if you wish! (if you could post them as a replay to your comment, it would make things easier)
http://i.imgur.com/zKQGrYI.gif FOR GREAT SCIENCE Laughing Fish!

Edit: Are you going to use FEK to count the upvotes to thread? We have dissenters downvoting it.

Here is my personal favorite for this totally non-heinous thread:
http://i.imgur.com/yS9kN3q.gif?noredirect

Be excellent and party on, Laughing Fish.
Aquaman's greastest nemesis, the Laughing Fish!
http://media.tumblr.com/tumblr_lj7t5xCIzu1qafrh6.gif

Thanks for all the entertainment Laughing Fish. Thanks to you I now know how to post GIF files.
Anyway, Laughing Fish cherishing every upvote:
http://i.imgur.com/SkfjGFf.gif

So as a newer person on the boards I'd just like to say Laughing Fish have all my upvotes.

http://i.imgur.com/9xGwoG6.gif
